classes.cCustomNote: Choose one of the following: PSY201, PSY202.

One course from each of the following GE areas must be completed: A1, A2, A3, B1, B2, B3, (B4 [lab] must be completed with either B2 or B3), B1-B5 elective, C1, C2, C3, C4, D1 or D3 (depending on whether HIST 202 or 223 is selected in support), D2, D5, and F. C4, D5, and F should be taken only after Junior standing is reached (90 units). One (1) course must be completed from B1, in addition to STAT 217. C4 cannot be fulfilled with COMS courses. Refer to online catalog for GE course selection and Graduation Writing Requirement (GWR).
Any Foreign Language 103-Level course can go here. Refer to the catalog.
